source_text: If Nimrod dilutes to below 10% interest, Nimrod converts to a 1.5% NSR with buy-down provisions on 0.5% available to CUS until first production.
additional_details: Royalty payable to Nimrod Resources Limited (NIM) by Copper Search Ltd (CUS). This royalty is triggered if NIM's interest in the project dilutes to below 10%. CUS has buy-down provisions on 0.5% of this NSR until first production.
